ygData.subject: Re: Guard killing  WAS hero bracer quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Keptin, Training guards and what not on you and blocking the zones is ILLEGAL. I am a dark elf myself, and had a few friends of the good aligned races come
ygData.messageBody:
Keptin,

Training guards and what not on you and blocking the zones is ILLEGAL. I am
a dark elf myself, and had a few friends of the 'good'aligned races come
into Neriak's foreign quarters killing the guards. A few dark elves and
trolls decided to start training NPCs on them, and the trolls BLOCKED the
zone. No one could leave unless they gated or evaced.

A GM was called on the scene, and the players harrassing were given an
official warning. My barbarian friend had died because of this zone
blocking, causing him to lose his level.

Roleplaying is one thing...causing people to die, and harrassing them is a
totally different story.

Lanadina


----Original Message Follows----
From: KEPTINPIKE@...
Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] hero bracer quest
Date: Wed, 22 Sep 1999 01:51:49 EDT

From: KEPTINPIKE@...

Dear Sirs:

We were killing guards inside Neriak's foreign quarters. We play on
the
Solusek Ro server. I play as Keptin Pike. We were harassed by players
there
who were constantly dispelling us and dumping monsters (guards) on us. In
fact they even managed to dump guards on us where Neriak zones to Nektulos
So we got trapped on both sides of the zone due to monster dumping. Two of
us died. I would like to remind you that we were not killing any vendors or
quest related NPCs. Also, in the Foreign Quarter there is no danger to
newbies from anything.
GM Hidaeki said this was perfectly legal since they were role-playing.
Hmm, I imagine I can do a lot of harassing and exploiting under the guise
of
role-playing. I asked about the exploit of PVP Switch Avoidance and he
ignored me. I have posted said exploit below as posted on your site.

PvP Switch Avoidance ï¿½ using in-game methods to work around the PvP switch
and allowing non-PvP players to kill other players, such as hall blocking,
dumping of monsters, or spell effects that cross that boundary due to a bug.


Please tell me if those players who were killing us fall under this exploit
and can be given an official warning.
